trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ControlType.Document"></xref> control types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 公開<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ControlType.Document"></xref>コントロール型を[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]です。

trans-unit.source: The DocumentAutomationPeer represents documents and supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: DocumentAutomationPeer がドキュメントを表し、 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>をサポートしています

trans-unit.source: Objects such as a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> can contain embedded objects, such as images and hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: などのオブジェクト、<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>または<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>イメージとハイパーリンクなど、埋め込みオブジェクトを含めることができます</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument></xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>。

trans-unit.source: Initially, when you try to get the child elements of the document, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName> does not return the embedded objects.
trans-unit.target: 最初に、しようとすると、ドキュメントの要素の子を取得する<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>埋め込みオブジェクトは返しません</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: To get the embedded elements, obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> and call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 埋め込まれた要素を取得するには<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>から<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern><xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>を呼び出すと</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>取得します。

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called, any elements in that <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> are returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>呼び出されると、その<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange><xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>によって返される</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>内にある要素</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>の後

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Unless you know the document is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, you should not call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ドキュメントがわかっていない場合は、 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>、呼び出す必要はありません<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A>上、<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName>プロパティ</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A></xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>。

trans-unit.source: If the document is loaded from a network location, calling <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> on the entire document is resource intensive.
trans-unit.target: ドキュメントがネットワークの場所から読み込まれている場合は、呼び出す<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A>ドキュメント全体のリソースではない負荷がかかります</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should use one of the methods on <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> that returns a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> that represents a portion of the document.
trans-unit.target: 代わりに、する必要がありますを使用してメソッドのいずれかで<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>を返す、 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>、ドキュメントの一部を表す</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange></xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 新しいインスタンスを初期化、 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>クラスです。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref>これに関連付けられている<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: これに関連付けられているコントロールのコントロールの種類を取得<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドは<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref>すべての場合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the screen coordinates of the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得、 <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>これに関連付けられている要素の画面座標を表す<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドは<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 外接する四角形。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements for the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 子要素のコレクションを取得、 <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref>これに関連付けられている<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドは<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: Because <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> gives access to its content through <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern"></xref>, this method always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>によってコンテンツへのアクセスを提供<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern"> </xref>、このメソッドは常に返します<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 名前を取得、 <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref>これに関連付けられている<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドは<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "Document".
trans-unit.target: "Document"を含む文字列です。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that represents the clickable space that is on the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得、 <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref>上にある、クリック可能な領域を表す、 <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref>これに関連付けられている<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドは<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>

trans-unit.source: The point that represents the clickable space that is on the element.
trans-unit.target: 要素には、クリック可能な領域を表すポイントです。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: コントロール パターンを取得、 <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref>これに関連付けられている<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 列挙値の&1; つ。

trans-unit.source: If patternInterface is , this method returns an .
trans-unit.target: If patternInterface is , this method returns an .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> is understood by the end user as interactive or the user might understand the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得または設定を示す値かどうか、 <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref>これに関連付けられている<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>対話的なものとしてエンドユーザーで認識されて、ユーザーが認識するか、 <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref>内のコントロールの論理構造に利用できるものとして、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)]です。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドは<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>すべての場合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: 示す値を取得するかどうか、 <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref>これに関連付けられている<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref>画面から外れています。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドは<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: このプロパティは、要素が表示されているかどうかを示すものではありません。

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: 状況によっては、要素は、画面には表示されていないです。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: たとえば、要素が他の要素によって隠されている場合に表示されません。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: この場合、メソッドを返します`false`です。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要素が画面上にない場合それ以外の場合、 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>です。
